rooms.name: Entrance Hall and Living Room
rooms.description: A spacious area featuring a welcoming entrance hall that leads into an open-plan living room with large windows aligned in the east for natural light, adhering to Vastu principles.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: The kitchen is designed with functional work zones, an island counter, and positioned to the south-east for optimal energy flow. It includes modern appliances and storage.

rooms.name: Dining Area
rooms.description: A separate dining area that opens into the living room, fostering a communal space for meals.

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom
rooms.description: A cozy guest bedroom with integrated dressing area, placed on the north side for peaceful ambiance and privacy.

rooms.name: Bathroom
rooms.description: A utility bathroom serving both living areas, located conveniently near the entrance to maximize accessibility.

rooms.name: Home Theatre
rooms.description: A dedicated home theatre space featuring a projection screen, sound system, and comfortable seating. Designed with acoustics in mind to minimize noise leakage, placed towards the west for energy balance.

openings.name: Main Entrance
openings.description: A wide entry door ensuring a welcoming and secure entry in line with Vastu principles.

openings.name: Window - Living Room / Home Theatre
openings.description: Large windows that enhance natural light while providing views of the exterior landscape.

openings.name: Kitchen Ventilation
openings.description: A ventilation window to ensure proper airflow and adherence to health codes.
